question: The Gita Research Institute will come up in which city of Uttar Pradesh?
explanation: The Gita Research Institute will soon be set up by the Uttar Pradesh government in Mathura for research on Gayan (singing), Vadan (the art of music) and Nratya (dance) of the Krishna age. It is a research institute for the study of the \'Bhagavad Gita\'.
